name: Infinite Space (itch) (Ronald DeSilva)
description:
Controller highly recommended!!!

This is a prototype of a project in development.

Infinite Space is a puzzle adventure that has you control an alien whose mission is to solve puzzles through randomly generated levels as you jump through obstacles, bounce around in ball formation, and go through tight spaces in mini formation, and solve numerous puzzles to get to the next room!

Role: Programmer, Level Designer, Sound Designer

Team Size: 5

Project Length: 2 Months

Programs I used: Unity, Visual Studio, Github, Audacity

Languages I used: C#

As a programmer on this project I worked on creating the obstacles, like the falling icicles and the spikes on the ground. The most challenging part of creating this game was implementing the wide variety of puzzle mechanics. I also created one of the levels of the game.

Controls:

Left Stick / WASD - Move

A Button / Spacebar - Jump

X Button / E key - Interact with the Formation Box / Pickup objects

Link to project page: https://calzones.itch.io/infinite-space
